title: CONSOLIDATED STATEMENTS OF INCOME - USD ($)shares in Thousands

null.label: Net Sales
null.definition: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income before deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

null.label: Cost of Merchandise Sold
null.definition: The aggregate costs related to goods produced and sold and services rendered by an entity during the reporting period. This excludes costs incurred during the reporting period related to financial services rendered and other revenue generating activities.

null.label: Gross profit
null.definition: Aggregate revenue less cost of goods and services sold or operating expenses directly attributable to the revenue generation activity.

null.label: Selling, general and administrative expenses
null.definition: The aggregate total costs related to selling a firm's product and services, as well as all other general and administrative expenses. Direct selling expenses (for example, credit, warranty, and advertising) are expenses that can be directly linked to the sale of specific products. Indirect selling expenses are expenses that cannot be directly linked to the sale of specific products, for example telephone expenses, Internet, and postal charges. General and administrative expenses include salaries of non-sales personnel, rent, utilities, communication, etc.

null.label: Depreciation and amortization
null.definition: The current period expense charged against earnings on long-lived, physical assets not used in production, and which are not intended for resale, to allocate or recognize the cost of such assets over their useful lives; or to record the reduction in book value of an intangible asset over the benefit period of such asset; or to reflect consumption during the period of an asset that is not used in production.

null.label: Goodwill and Intangible Asset Impairment
null.definition: Total loss recognized during the period from the impairment of goodwill plus the loss recognized in the period resulting from the impairment of the carrying amount of intangible assets, other than goodwill.

null.label: Operating income
null.definition: The net result for the period of deducting operating expenses from operating revenues.

null.label: Interest expense, net
null.definition: Amount of the cost of borrowed funds accounted for as interest expense.

null.label: Income before income taxes
null.definition: Amount of income (loss) from continuing operations before deduction of income tax expense (benefit) and income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest, and addition of income (loss) from equity method investments.

null.label: Income tax expense
null.definition: Amount of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations.

null.label: Net income
null.definition: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent.

null.label: Net income per share – basic
null.definition: The amount of net income (loss) for the period per each share of common stock or unit outstanding during the reporting period.

null.label: Net income per share – diluted
null.definition: The amount of net income (loss) for the period available to each share of common stock or common unit outstanding during the reporting period and to each share or unit that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of common shares or units for all dilutive potential common shares or units outstanding during the reporting period.

null.label: Basic
null.definition: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

null.label: Diluted
null.definition: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.

null.label: Dividends declared per common share outstanding
null.definition: Aggregate dividends declared during the period for each share of common stock outstanding.

null.label: Goodwill and Intangible Asset Impairment
null.definition: Total loss recognized during the period from the impairment of goodwill plus the loss recognized in the period resulting from the impairment of the carrying amount of intangible assets, other than goodwill.

null.label: Other Asset Impairment Charges
null.definition: The charge against earnings resulting from the write down of long lived assets other than goodwill due to the difference between the carrying value and lower fair value.
